message: I propose dividing the money in an 80-20 ratio, with me receiving 80 dollars. This offers a reasonable split considering the potential decrease in value due to inflation.

Considering the inflation, I propose a new 64-36 split. This aims to balance the value received by both parties while acknowledging the decreasing worth of money with each passing round.
